website_summaries.verdict: An excellent way to kickstart your makeup collection, this set focuses on quantity and quality.
pros: Kit includes a large palette with 24 eyeshadow shades and 4 face products, lip gloss, setting spray, and infamous Better Than Sex mascara
You'll have everything you need to create a complete look with this set
Included makeup bag is spacious without being bulky
cons: A few of the shadows are not very pigmented

customer_reviews.title: USED!  Old, half full GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: SHAME ON YOU! I don’t usually review and why do I have to give one star?! The box is tattered, has been opened, then retaped! The pallet has been USED, you can see in the pics and the lipgloss is stale and stinking! The mascara was dry as a bone! The hangover spray was halfway and the label was coming off! Disgraceful! $55 for used garbage you shouldn’t be selling and I’d bet it’s a knockoff! I’m ticked!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was 10 plus on customer service and  Making sure I was Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The First one when I received it the box was crushed and the eyeshadow was everywhere and broken. Contacted Amazon right away I had pictures but they didn't ask for anything and I had choice refund or send another. I asked for another. It was overnighted.. I seen it came from another site but Amazon was the seller. The Company it was mailed from I give -3 no packing on either one the box was crushed still it's the too face box. Amazon was amazing on customer service. The company that just threw it in a box to mail be careful from that company. Reason for 3 was because of packing and both times the tooFaced box was crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Streul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The box appeared to have been opened & re-taped; the box somewhat crushed. We were able to return it for a refund.y
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Radomski

customer_reviews.title: Nice Colors
customer_reviews.text: I Don't Wear Make Up But Brought This Product For My Daughter As A Christmas Present And She Loved It!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Loved this set!!
customer_reviews.text: The palette is so good, its gives you, contour, blush, highlight, and eyeshadows, additional it comes with the primer that smells so good and the mascara its so cute, lip gloss is normal size, so comparing prices this is a good deal, you are not going to regret.
customer_reviews.author: Maily Duque

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Product came damaged and mascara dry. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & value
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything pictured, really love this palette and the trial-size samples it came with.
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Too faced
customer_reviews.text: That I found one just hope it is not a fake.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for mother's day, and my mom loves the hues of nudes for the eyeshadow, especially the hangover 3 in 1 mist. She claims that she doesn't need primer and it's her new favorite product.
customer_reviews.author: kittypie

customer_reviews.title: Missing item. How do we get it?
customer_reviews.text: Love it, very nice...but the Deluxe hangover setting spray is missing from the box? Would like to know how I can get one sent without returning the entire package again.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA PISANI

product_meta.title: TOO FACED Dream Queen Limited-Edition Make Up Collection
product_meta.description: This set contains: - 24 x Eyeshadows in Twinkle (pearl with gold shift), Wrap It Up (shimmering peach with gold sparkle), Secret Santa (matte dusty rose), Polar Bear Hug (pearl white), Unwrapped (matte warm brown), Christmas Cookie (gilded brown), Let's Kringle (matte orange brown), All The Jingle Ladies (metallic bronze), Here For The 'Hos (deep espresso with gold sparkle), Snowball Effect (matte cream), Pink Flurries (peachy pink), Cozy Up (metallic scarlet), Son Of A Nut-Cracker (chestnut brown), Kiss Miss (matte bubblegum pink), S'elfies (shimmering silvered mauve), Keep Your Hands To Your Elf (iced soft pink), Holly Grail (shimmering teal with maroon shift), Santa’s Bakeshop (matte mauve taupe), Let's Roll (warm plum), Christmas Cheer (metallic rosewood), Christmas FOMO (electric violet), Special Delivery (matte deep black), Silver Bells (iced silver), Holly Daze (teal with silver sparkle) - 2 x Blush in Sweet On Santa (peach pearl), Winterberry (dusty rose with gold sparkle) - Bronzer in Chestnuts Roasting (warm bronze) - Highlighter in Snow Extra (champagne pearl) - 0.17 oz/ 4.8 g Deluxe Better Than Sex Mascara - 0.10 oz/ 2.9 mL Dreamy Lips Ultra Plush Lip Gloss in Shade Pink Swan - 1 oz/ 30 mL Travel-Size Hangover Spray - 4 x Face Powders: Bronzer, Cool-Toned Blush, Warm-Toned Blush, Gold-Toned Highlighter - Fold-over Bag
feature_bullets: TOO FACED Dream Queen Limited-Edition Make Up Collection
